citation: Proclamation under the Residential Tenancy Amendment (Boarding Premises) Act 2003 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Residential Tenancy Amendment (Boarding Premises) Act 2003

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Residential Tenancy Amendment (Boarding Premises) Act 2003 fix 25 August 2004 as the day on which that Act commences.

23 August 2004

W. J. E. COX

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

STEVEN KONS

Minister for Primary Industries and Water acting for and on behalf of the Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 August 2004

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
